name: Fat Shrooms
description:
Thank you for playing!

Food drops from the sky. Learn which ones are "healthy" and "unhealthy" as they each impact your character in a different way.  Be careful, dropping a food will have the opposite effect on the player!

Targeted foods will appear to your right. Make sure to catch them as they will grant you gold.  when  if you die you can open the shop to purchase costumes. 

Next update will eliminate these major issues:

- Textures are loaded every frame

- Game is not dependent on seconds per frame

Make sure to check out my other projects
